item.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
item.description: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income.”

item.title: Saving for retirement is easier than you may think
item.description: Time — lots of it — is your biggest ally

item.title: What the ‘fire Powell’ trade could look like as Trump attacks Fed chair again
item.description: The firing of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell by President Donald Trump would lead to “the most dramatic rush to the exit from U.S. assets that it...

item.title: ‘I’m 15 years older’: My second wife says she will pass my estate onto my sons. What could go wrong?
item.description: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known.”

item.title: Intel’s earnings outlook could be ‘useless.’ Here’s what matters instead.
item.description: New CEO Lip-Bu Tan’s first earnings call with Wall Street is later this week. Analysts see next week’s “Foundry Day” as a bigger possible catalyst.
